medium: Etching with softground and aquatint in color; together with cast metal lily pad
title: The Elements: Water
marks: Signature, Date, Edition, Chop LLC, in pencil: [56/80 2 of 4 JB]; LRC, impressed
description: print (a): blue-green vessel; red box, URC; horizontal skeleton, L of center; three squares and one rectangle with plaid designs; white flowers, LLC; lily pad (b) shaped piece of brown iron-leaf with incised veins and 3-D stem
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
